bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding zero based budgeting requirements.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding zero based budgeting requirements. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 4-7A-2 be amended to read as follows: 4-7A-2. During each legislative session, the joint committee on appropriations may shall choose and direct a maximum of six departments one or more state agencies, or divisions or offices therein, to use the zero based budget format in preparing their next fiscal year budget request submitted pursuant to § 4-7-7. The committee may further limit the number of programs selected in each agency. Decision packages shall include justifications and level of service for each funding level requested by the agency. The committee shall establish a schedule whereby each state agency uses the zero based budget format once every ten years. 135 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.075 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
